short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for performing quick advanced searches based on the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows a user to quickly use Google's advanced search operators

These operators currently include:
- Site search
- Related sites
  - Page and Domain level
- Site Information
  - Page and Domain level
- Cached versions of pages within Google

These searches can be from the page/domain that you are currently browsing or inputting a domain will bring back search results related to this domain.
